DOC.brief_summary: Obesity major health problem reach epidemic level . Efforts need develop cost-effective public health approach weight loss maintenance . One approach develop team-based program may motivate people lose weight and/or increase physical activity . One program entitle Shape-up Rhode Island ( SURI ) . The current trial investigate whether add behavioral intervention deliver online PLUS automate feedback self-monitoring would enhance outcome SURI participant .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Shape Up Rhode Island Campaign Study 5
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Given epidemic obesity , approach weight loss apply community , state , national level need . This project ongoing evaluation Shape Up Rhode Island ( SURI ) program , state-wide Internet base program involve team-based competition increase physical activity achieve weight loss . Aim : To enhance effectiveness SURI utilize minimal contact intervention deliver online . Design : SURI 2009 participant invite join research study focus weight loss . Interested participant randomize two group include SURI Enhanced group ( behavioral intervention present 12 weekly online presentation , daily self-monitoring , weekly automate feedback ) SURI Standard group ( group give list previously exist online resource aid weight loss ) .
DOC.criteria: Overweight obese Current participant Shape Up RI program weight loss competition
